Class Dealer

java.lang.Object
com.dnikitin.poker.game.engine.Dealer
public class Dealer extends Object
Manages deck operations: shuffling, dealing, and card exchange. Extracts dealing logic from Table for better separation of concerns.

    • exchangeCards

      Exchanges cards for a player during the draw phase.
      Parameters:
      player - Player exchanging cards
      indexesToDiscard - Indexes of cards to discard
      Returns:
      New cards dealt to the player

      Checks if the deck has enough cards for an operation.

      requiredCards - Number of cards needed
      Returns:
      true if deck has enough cards
